short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bring "paste and go" functionality to everywhere in the browser

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Just like the "Paste and Go" functionality on the browser address bar, but extended to input fields in any website.

Right click and select, or press Ctrl (command) + alt (option) + V to paste and go.

Please note that you have to give clipboard permission the first time you use paste and go on each page. This is to required by the browser.
